text:

Read and format project data
# Include and execute your code here

Highlight the Questions and Tasks

title: Client Report - [Insert Project Title]
text:
QUESTION|TASK 1
COPY PASTE QUESTION|TASK 1 FROM THE PROJECT HERE
type your results and analysis here


Read and format data
# Include and execute your code here


include figures in chunks and discuss your findings in the figure.


plot example
# Include and execute your code here
chart = px.bar(df.head(200),
    x="name", 
    y="AK"
)
chart.show()



                                                
My useless chart




table example
# Include and execute your code here
mydat = df.head(1000)\
    .groupby('year')\
    .sum()\
    .reset_index()\
    .tail(10)\
    .filter(["year", "AK","AR"])

display(mydat)

title: Ange K. Kouadio’s CV
text:
Data Scientist, Mathematician, Statistician

MyLinkedIn | Email | Phone



Data Analyst Intern at Bodyguardz Brands


Fraud Detection, Financial Modeling, Predictive Analytics, Risk Assessment



Data Science, Business Analytics, Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Predictive Analysis




September 2024 - July 2026 Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho
Bachelor of Science - Data Science
Minor: Statistics
Certificate: Full Stack Development
Area of Interest: Fraud Detection, Financial Modeling, Predictive Analytics, Risk Assessment
January 2023 - April 2024 Ensign College, Salt Lake City, UT
Certificate: Business Analytics
GPA: 3.3 / 4.0
Emphasis: Data Science
September 2015 - December 2021 Felix Houphouet Boigny University, Abidjan, Cote D’Ivoire
Bachelor of Science - Mathematics
Developed critical thinking in statistical analysis, advanced calculus, and algebra




Data Analysis: Python, R, Excel, Pivot Tables, SQL, Qualtrics, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Business Intelligence Tools: Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio
Soft Skills: Teamwork, Communication, Problem Solving, Leadership, Time Management, French




January 2024 - July 2024 Data Analyst Intern, Bodyguardz Brands, Lehi, UT - Established database tables in BigQuery to securely store data from over 3 sources, improving efficiency by 40% and preserving 100% of historical data previously at risk of disappearing or getting deleted - Created a sales dashboard in Looker Studio using SQL in BigQuery, reducing reporting time by 30% - Fostered long-term colleague relationships via collaboration, enhancing cohesion and project success
January 2023 - January 2024 Data Analyst, Career and Internship Services, Ensign College, Salt Lake City, UT - Amplified productivity by 25% by using a Power BI dashboard to track mentor interactions with students - Created a data pipeline with Qualtrics to collect student survey responses, generating a live Power BI dashboard boosting career fair attendance by 25% - Partnered with data engineers to clarify project requirements, delivering product in 50% of allocated time
January 2020 - December 2022 Math Tutor, HomeSchool, Abidjan, Cote D’Ivoire - Tutored 13 12th grade students in calculus and algebra, achieving an 80% average score increase - Provided personalized training to 2 college juniors in statistics, leading to a 70% grade improvement



September 2024 - December 2024 Class Related Project
January 2024 - Present Data-Driven Decision Making Project, MIT Data Science Certificate / Brigham Young University - Data Science Association, Rexburg, Idaho - Designed a recommendation system in Python to help Amazon suggest products to customers - Engineered a machine learning model with Python to predict lead conversions, optimize resource allocation, and lift customer acquisition for an EdTech startup



















2024 Bodyguardz Brands, Lehi, UT - Data Analyst Intern
2023 Career and Internship Services, Ensign College, Salt Lake City, UT - Data Analyst

Data Analysis: Python, R, Excel, Pivot Tables, SQL, Qualtrics, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Business Intelligence Tools: Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio
Soft Skills: Teamwork, Communication, Problem Solving, Leadership, Time Management, French

title: Ange K. Kouadio’s CV
text:
January 2024 - July 2024 Data Analyst Intern, Bodyguardz Brands, Lehi, UT - Established database tables in BigQuery to securely store data from over 3 sources, improving efficiency by 40% and preserving 100% of historical data previously at risk of disappearing or getting deleted - Created a sales dashboard in Looker Studio using SQL in BigQuery, reducing reporting time by 30% - Fostered long-term colleague relationships via collaboration, enhancing cohesion and project success
January 2023 - January 2024 Data Analyst, Career and Internship Services, Ensign College, Salt Lake City, UT - Amplified productivity by 25% by using a Power BI dashboard to track mentor interactions with students - Created a data pipeline with Qualtrics to collect student survey responses, generating a live Power BI dashboard boosting career fair attendance by 25% - Partnered with data engineers to clarify project requirements, delivering product in 50% of allocated time
January 2020 - December 2022 Math Tutor, HomeSchool, Abidjan, Cote D’Ivoire - Tutored 13 12th grade students in calculus and algebra, achieving an 80% average score increase - Provided personalized training to 2 college juniors in statistics, leading to a 70% grade improvement

title: Ange K. Kouadio’s CV
text:
September 2024 - December 2024 Class Related Project
January 2024 - Present Data-Driven Decision Making Project, MIT Data Science Certificate / Brigham Young University - Data Science Association, Rexburg, Idaho - Designed a recommendation system in Python to help Amazon suggest products to customers - Engineered a machine learning model with Python to predict lead conversions, optimize resource allocation, and lift customer acquisition for an EdTech startup
